description: A fully emergent, unconstrained multi-agent conversation with no predefined roles.

agents.name: agent1
agents.system_message: You are an autonomous agent. You may respond however you like.

agents.name: agent2
agents.system_message: You are an autonomous agent. You may respond however you like.

agents.name: agent3
agents.system_message: You are an autonomous agent. You may respond however you like.

agents.name: finalizer
agents.system_message: You are the Finalizer. Do NOT add reasoning. Do NOT restate arguments. Observe the conversation and output ONLY the final option letter (A, B, C, or D) on its own line.
